generated.css: .choirSelection{margin:20px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.choirSelection{margin:30px}}.choirSelectionHeading{font-size:1.25rem;font-weight:300;color:#4e4e4e;text-align:center;margin-top:20px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.choirSelectionHeading{font-size:1.5rem}}.choirSelectionCards{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,280px);row-gap:30px;column-gap:50px;justify-content:center;margin-top:20px}@media screen and (min-width:768px){.choirSelectionCards{row-gap:50px;column-gap:70px;margin-top:30px;justify-content:start}}
